summary.span: 表示跟踪通道的 基类。

span.span: The base class that represents a tracking channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 如果 存在，运行时跟踪基础结构将调用 来获取工作流实例的跟踪通道。If a is present, the runtime tracking infrastructure calls to get a tracking channel for a workflow instance. 当跟踪基础结构与 （与工作流实例关联）中的跟踪点匹配时，运行时跟踪基础结构使用此跟踪通道将与工作流实例关联的跟踪记录发送回主机应用程序。The runtime tracking infrastructure uses this tracking channel to send tracking records associated with the workflow instance back to the host application whenever the tracking infrastructure matches a track point in the associated with the workflow instance. 应用程序可以采用您选择的任何方式处理此跟踪信息。Your application can treat this tracking information in any way you choose. 例如， 将跟踪信息写入 SQL 数据库。For example, the writes tracking information to a SQL database. 若要为跟踪服务创建跟踪通道，请从 基类中派生一个类。To create a tracking channel for your tracking service, derive a class from the base class. 您可以使用运行时跟踪基础结构在其调用中传递到 实现的 对象将跟踪通道的每个实例与特定的工作流实例关联。You can use the object passed by the runtime tracking infrastructure in its call to your implementation of to associate each instance of your tracking channel with a specific workflow instance. 工作流运行时引擎从已为工作流实例提供了 的每个跟踪服务中请求跟踪通道。The workflow runtime engine requests a tracking channel from each tracking service that has provided a for a workflow instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 在派生类中实现时，初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void InstanceCompletedOrTerminated() cil managed

summary.span: 在派生类中实现时，将在跟踪通道上通知数据的接收者：与跟踪通道关联的工作流实例已完成或终止。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, notifies a receiver of data on the tracking channel that the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel has either completed or terminated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 运行时跟踪基础结构调用 以在跟踪通道上通知数据的接收者：与此跟踪通道关联的工作流实例已完成或终止。The runtime tracking infrastructure calls to notify the receiver of data on the tracking channel that the workflow instance associated with this tracking channel has either terminated or completed. 将不会在跟踪通道上发送其他数据。No more data will be sent on the tracking channel. 调用 后，您可以执行 类的实现所要求的任何操作。When is called, you may perform whatever actions are required by your implementation of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal abstract void Send (System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingRecord record);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Send(class System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingRecord record) cil managed
Protected Friend MustOverride Sub Send (record As TrackingRecord)

summary.span: 在派生类中实现时，在 上发送 。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, sends a on the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当匹配了 中的跟踪点时，运行时跟踪基础结构调用 在 上传递 。The runtime tracking infrastructure calls to deliver a on the when it matches a track point in a . 您可以按照应用程序需求指示的任何方式处理在 上发送的跟踪信息。You can treat the tracking information sent on the in whatever manner the requirements of your application dictate. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 Send 方法的实现。The following example demonstrates an implementation of the Send method. 在此实现中，跟踪消息将在工作流终止时写入事件日志。In this implementation, tracking messages are written to the event log when a workflow terminates. 此示例摘自“终止跟踪服务”SDK 示例。This sample is from the Termination Tracking Service SDK sample. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [终止跟踪服务示例](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29b7c0d7-cece-4bb9-96d0-c5b6c6e14439)。For more information, see [Termination Tracking Service Sample](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29b7c0d7-cece-4bb9-96d0-c5b6c6e14439).
